page.title: 10HOME LIFE IN INNERLEITHEN
page.content: Clothes:manmade fibres or mixtures. Children wear trousers and T shirts, tracksuits and trainers,light quilted coats or bodywarmers.Girls have ears pierced. Short hair is fashionable. Central heating,double glazing,elect./ gas fires and cookers,fitted carpets; plastic and elect.equipment_all types. Freezers with baking,garden veg,salmon Most use cars/buses;walk for pleasure; planes for sunshine holiday package deals in Spain, Majorca and in U.K. Shop in supermarkets and large city stores / warehouses.{Breakfast}cereal/ toast /nil {Lunch}soup / light snack {Evening main meal}chicken,meat,fish, veg.Drink coffee or coke.People eat crisps between meals.At School Tuck Shop sugarfree snacks are sold. Children own computers,personal Hi-Fi, videos,tape recorders,portable TV's, electric organs and B.M.X. bikes.
